alert.note: Alert for Walker; Winston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 3:54AM CDT until April 01 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN WALKER AND SOUTHEASTERN WINSTON COUNTIES... At 354 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Helicon to near Curry to 7 miles east of Carbon Hill, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Carbon Hill, Arley, Kansas, Eldridge, Curry, Camp McDowell, Smith Dam, Smith Lake, Poplar Springs, Helicon, Falls City, Mill Branch, Maple Branch, Little Dismal Creek, Coon Creek, Powellville, Lupton, Battle Branch and Hidden Cove Campground. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for central, northwestern and west central Alabama. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
